summary: PE00 020;  CONSUMER WAS TRAVELING 45MPH ON  HIGHWAY AND SMELLED THE TIRES.  WAS ABLE TO PULL OVER TO THE SHOULDERS, AND NOTICED THA T INSIDE DRIVER'S SIDE, AND  RIGHT FRONT TIRE TREAD SEPARATED .   FIRESTONE, STEEL TEX #AT 7.5 BY 16,    AND THERE WAS ANOTHER TIRE R4,TIRE TREAD SEPARATED.  THERE WERE NO INJURIES.   FIRESTONE WILL BE NOTIFIED.*AK
